name: Oles Honchar
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the distinguished Ukrainian writer and public figure Oles Honchar (1918 -1995).
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there are depicted sunflowers, the small National Emblem of Ukraine, the logotype of the NBU Mint and inscriptions: УКРАЇНА, 2, ГРИВНІ, 2000 (Ukraine/ 2 /hryvnia/ 2000)
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a bust of the writer, on the left - a cathedral and the conventionalized inscriptions: СОБОРИ ДУШ СВОЇХ БЕРЕЖІТЬ! ОЛЕСЬ ГОНЧАР (protect/ your sole/ temples/ Oles/ Honchar (facsimile) 1918 -1995
